content.text: I'm doing well. I'm a trans woman who was born male and transitioned at 17. I'm looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business. I surf every chance I get.

That's great! I'm a married woman with five children. I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman. I love bananas because they are a quick and easy snack that can give me a boost of energy during my long runs.
That's wonderful! I love hearing about people's families. I'm also a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
That's great! What do you do for work?
I'm a knitter and I love learning new techniques. I also enjoy surfing.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to knit.
It's not too hard! You should give it a try.
